Name: Glorious Day to Die
About the game: GAME 'Glorious Day to Die' is a third person role playing/action game mixing exploration and real time combat. In the style of a 3D wave based action game, you will be transported to a fantastic world where you will play as character, who controls a dog 'German Shepard' and fight enemies from alien world. THE WORLD The game takes place in a world where someone accidentally opened an ancient portal to a separate world. Creatures from that world wants to conquer this earth as they tried thousandths years ago but were stopped by our ancestors. THE GAME CHARACTERISTICS Throughout the completing waves, character will receive coins to upgrade weapon and armor, discover new types of weapons, useful for the rest of the adventure. In the conquest of the forest you will fight enemies after some waves you will travel through the portal to large enemy world. As of right now only forest completed but we are working hard to complete the alien world. GAMEPLAY ADDITIONS Throughout the game you will be accompanied by Dog, that will sniff and find invisible enemies and can attack monster by your will.
